data.title: W. Fern Graham
data.text:
Wilma Fern Graham, age 82, of Brookfield, MO, formerly of Winston, passed away on June 22, 2017, at McLarney Manor in Brookfield.

Fern was born on May 31, 1935, near Cameron, to Emmett and Anna (McDaniel) Wilson. She was a 1953 graduate of the Kidder High School in Kidder. She was a mother, homemaker, and worked as a waitress at Fina and Pringleâ€™s in Cameron.

Fern was a member of the Kidder Baptist Church.

She was preceded in death by her parents; brother, Jack; sister, Doris; and an infant son, Roger Dale Orr.

Survivors include her children, Rick Orr of Linneus, Jim Orr of Brookfield, Randy Orr of Kansas City, Brenda Goll of Winston, Ronnie Orr of Breckenridge, Eddie Orr of Kidder, and Sandy Gann of Brookfield; siblings, Bob Wilson of Cameron, Irma Fewins of Polo, Mary Lou Smith of El Dorado Springs, Bill Wilson of Lathrop, and Pat Gates of Cameron; numerous grandchildren, great-grandchildren, great great-grandchildren; and nieces and nephews.

A formal visitation will be held on Sunday, June 25, from 3:00 to 5:00 p.m. at Bram Funeral Home in Hamilton. Cremation will follow and is entrusted to Bram Funeral Home. A memorial graveside inurnment service will be held at 10:00 a.m. on Saturday, July 8, at the Kidder Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, memorials may be made to the activity department at McLarney Manor in Brookfield.
